titleStmt.title: Oratio habita in scholâ Christi orphano-trophii coram illustrissimo civitatis prætore, dignissimis præsidibus, fidissimis thesaurariis; et cæteris hospitiorum Londinensibus patronis benignissimis: Septembris xxjmo, 1675.
titleStmt.author: Moore, John, 1729-1802.

notesStmt.note: Copy tightly bound; with print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.
